pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accurate Estimation of Influenza Epidemics using Google Search Data // Augmented Regression with General Online data (ARGO) for accurate estimation of influenza epidemics in United States on national level, regional level and state level. It replicates the method introduced in paper Yang, S., Santillana, M. and Kou, S.C. (2015) doi:10.1073/pnas.1515373112; Ning, S., Yang, S. and Kou, S.C. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41559-6; Yang, S., Ning, S. and Kou, S.C. (2021) doi:10.1038/s41598-021-83084-5.
